name: immobiliensuche-pro
title: Immobiliensuche Pro - DE Real Estate Aggregator
description: Advanced German real estate aggregator for ImmobilienScout24, Immonet & Immowelt. Cross-portal search with deduplication, normalized pricing (kalt/warm), change tracking, and webhooks. Pay per result.

storefront.shortDescription: One search, three portals, zero duplicates. German real estate with normalized fields, price/㎡, and change tracking.
storefront.longDescription: Immobiliensuche Pro aggregates listings from Germany's top real estate portals (ImmobilienScout24, Immonet, Immowelt) with intelligent deduplication and normalized data. Features include cross-portal search, price normalization (kalt/warm/kaufpreis), computed metrics (price per ㎡), change tracking for new listings and price updates, and webhook/email notifications. Perfect for real estate professionals, investors, and researchers who need comprehensive market data.
